name: The Plight Of Hubris: Zalithar's Fall
name_original: The Plight Of Hubris: Zalithar's Fall
description:
Abstract: Fight your way through Zalithar's Lair to defeat your fallen apprentice Zalithar whom has been terrorising the locals with his Underlings.

This is a prototype I built over the last 2 weeks for a university project. Inspired by Metroidvania games like Hollow Knight and Castlevania, with a splash of influence from D&D, I hope this proves an enjoyable experience! And don't forget to drop me a review x
